findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risks after the agreement expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond can lead to unfair advantages or misuse of the legal remedy, potentially resulting in significant harm to either party.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may hinder business flexibility, especially during mergers or acquisitions, possibly delaying transactions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
